sn11.24:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū sampayojesuṁ.
sn11.24:1.4: Atha kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno santike accayaṁ accayato deseti;
sn11.24:1.6: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn11.24:1.7: “idha, bhante, dve bhikkhū sampayojesuṁ, tatreko bhikkhu accasarā.
sn11.24:1.8: Atha kho so, bhante, bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno santike accayaṁ accayato deseti, so bhikkhu nappaṭiggaṇhātī”ti.
sn11.24:2.2: Yo ca accayaṁ accayato na passati, yo ca accayaṁ desentassa yathādhammaṁ nappaṭiggaṇhāti—
sn11.24:2.5: Yo ca accayaṁ accayato passati, yo ca accayaṁ desentassa yathādhammaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti—
sn11.24:3.1: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo sudhammāyaṁ sabhāyaṁ deve tāvatiṁse anunayamāno tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
